unnormalised: For your trip to Kerala, budget approx. ₹50000 for a 7-day trip, including flights (₹15000), accommodation (₹2000/night), and local transport & food (₹1000/day), but remember to factor in extra ₹10000 for unexpected expenses or souvenirs!
normalised: For your trip to Kerala, budget approximately rupee fifty thousand for a seven day trip, including flights rupee fifteen thousand, accommodation rupee two thousand per night, and local transport and food rupee one thousand per day, but remember to factor in extra rupee ten thousand for unexpected expenses or souvenirs!
